item.description:
Ascent via Jewell, descent via Ammonoosuc Ravine, taking in up to four Presidential peaks. 

This is an advanced level hike for very fit hikers with full winter equipment including crampons and snowshoes, and prior experience hiking above treeline in winter, and who have been out hiking this winter.  Pace will be quick. 

This hike is for participants who exercise regularly during the week. 

For those not wishing to do the full four-course dinner, selecting peaks "a la carte" is permissible, but you must know the route, have a map, and be comfortable hiking alone, if need be. 

Please put yourself on the waiting list and I'll get back to you!
item.name: Mts. Jefferson, Washington, Monroe, Eisenhower (advanced)
